ygData.subject: Re: New Guild
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t mean to be classist just this will be for the preservation of magic in Norrath.  I know there are many Warrior and Thief type guilds only out there.
ygData.messageBody:
I don't mean to be classist just this will be for the preservation of magic
in Norrath. I know there are many Warrior and Thief type guilds only out
there.

Kinthir,
-----Original Message-----
From: Papa Legba <legba@...>
To: rodcet_nife@onelist.com <rodcet_nife@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, May 05, 1999 8:38 AM
Subject: Re: [rodcet_nife] New Guild


>From: Papa Legba <legba@...>
>
>Well thats pretty big of you, an anti-warrior/thief guild...
>
>
>
>> I am looking to create a guild of all race and class combinations as
>> long as the person has a good moral and the class is one of the
>> specific spellcasting guilds. Wizard, Cleric, Enchanter, Necromancer,
>> and Magician. Paladins, Druids, and Bards are also possibly addmited
>> into the guild as semi-casters yet as full non secluded members. This
>> is currently an unnoficial guild and will be based solely on Rodcet
>> Nife. If you ahve an interest in this, then please send it to the
>> mailing list and my e-mail. sachav@....
>
>
